definition: morning newspaper/(in a newspaper's name) Morning Post

sentences.english: If you subscribe to the morning paper, it’ll be delivered to your door.

sentences.english: Chongqing Morning Post 6 years has been closely watching the forefront of progress every step of life.
sentences.chinese: 重慶晨報已連續6年密切關注前沿生物的每一步進展。

sentences.english: The most famous is The Times.
